mapper.insert: /* KakaoMapper.insertUserToken */ INSERT INTO tbl_repository (memberNo, accessToken, expiresIn, refreshToken, refreshTokenExpiresIn, createdDate, updatedDate) VALUES (#{memberNo}, #{accessToken}, #{expiresIn}, #{refreshToken}, #{refreshTokenExpiresIn}, now(), now())
mapper.update: /* KakaoMapper.updateUserToken */ UPDATE tbl_repository SET accessToken = #{accessToken}, expiresIn= #{expiresIn}, refreshToken= #{refreshToken}, refreshTokenExpiresIn= #{refreshTokenExpiresIn}, updatedDate= now() WHERE memberNo = #{memberNo}
